Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: BEGIN DECLARE @passPlusNoise NVARCHAR(MAX) SET @passPlusNoise = 'toto' + @password + 'tata' RETURN HASHBYTES(N'SHA2_256',@passPlusNoise) END

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SET @userId = 0; IF EXISTS (SELECT EmployeeId FROM Employee WHERE UserName = @userName AND [Password] = dbo.SF_HashPassword(@password)) SELECT @userId = EmployeeId FROM Employee WHERE UserName = @userName RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SET @isAdmin = 0 SELECT @isAdmin = IIF([Role] = 'Admin', 1, 0) FROM Employee WHERE EmployeeID = @empId

Property.Name: HeaderContents
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT LocalId, LocalName, LocalFloor FROM [Local] WHERE [LocalFloor] = @floor

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: SELECT LocalId, LocalName, LocalFloor FROM [Local] WHERE [LocalId] = @id
